userId.description: User Id to filter by. Use System.Guid.Empty to not filter by user.

startIndex.description: Optional. The record index to start at. All items with a lower index will be dropped from the results.

limit.description: Optional. The maximum number of records to return.

supportsLatestItems.description: Optional. Filter by channels that support getting latest items.

supportsMediaDeletion.description: Optional. Filter by channels that support media deletion.

isFavorite.description: Optional. Filter by channels that are favorite.

$ul: **StartIndex**: The index of the first record in Items.
**TotalRecordCount**: The total number of records available.
